<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="320dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@android:color/background_dark" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Drag Handle --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/drag_handle" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:contentDescription="Drag handle" android:src="@drawable/ic_drag_handle_overlay" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/title" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="Customize Overlay" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/drag_handle" />
<!-- Close Button --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/close_customization_button" android:layout_width="36dp" android:layout_height="36dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:contentDescription="Close" android:src="@drawable/close_24px" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/title" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/title" />
<!-- Button Size Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/size_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Button Size:" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/title" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/size_value" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="48dp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/size_label" />
<SeekBar android:id="@+id/size_seekbar" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:max="64" android:min="32" android:progress="48" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/size_label" />
<!-- Button Visibility Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/visibility_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Button Visibility:" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/size_seekbar" />
<!-- RecyclerView for button customization --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/buttons_recycler_view" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:maxHeight="300dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/visibility_label" />
<!-- Reset Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/reset_button" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Reset to Defaults" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/buttons_recycler_view" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
